metadata.source_authority: WARC Effective 100 (2021-2025) + WARC Awards for Effectiveness

campaign_identification.campaign_name: The Breakaway: The first eCycling team for prisoners

audience_demographics.primary: Adults interested in sports and social causes

business_challenge.primary_challenge: Demonstrate how sport can change people's lives
business_challenge.market_situation: Need to showcase transformative power of sport
business_challenge.competitive_context: Sports brands competing on purpose-driven messaging

campaign_objectives.primary_objective: Show sport's transformative power for prisoners

strategy_execution.core_strategy: First eCycling team for prisoners via Zwift platform
execution_elements: Six prisoners chosen to ride online with other cyclists

creative_elements.brand_integration: Moderate - focus on purpose over product

business_challenge.primary_challenge: COVID impact, inflation, online shopping shift
business_challenge.market_situation: Small retailers struggling against online giants like Amazon

campaign_objectives.primary_objective: Support local stores, increase mental availability
secondary_objectives: Encourage shopping at small local stores

strategy_execution.core_strategy: Hyper-personalized ads with SRK for every store
execution_elements: Shah Rukh Khan mentioning specific store names

creative_elements.cultural_relevance: Very High - Bollywood star, local stores

business_challenge.primary_challenge: 33% population unbanked, rural farmers excluded
business_challenge.market_situation: UCB seen as traditional bank lacking innovation
business_challenge.competitive_context: Financial inclusion gap in rural areas

campaign_objectives.primary_objective: Enable farmers to sell produce at fair prices

strategy_execution.core_strategy: Collection points for produce-to-bank account conversion

business_challenge.primary_challenge: 33,000 Dutch teens had intimate footage shared without consent
business_challenge.market_situation: Online shaming leading to depression and suicide
business_challenge.social_issue: Society blaming victims rather than perpetrators

campaign_objectives.primary_objective: Transform attitudes towards online shaming

strategy_execution.core_strategy: TikTok talk show + musician MEAU collaboration
execution_elements: Song creation based on real victim stories
Music video highlighting online shaming impact

market_context.cultural_context: 15% of homes don't have fathers, single mothers are cultural taboo

business_challenge.primary_challenge: Single mothers remain a cultural taboo in Middle East
business_challenge.market_situation: Father's Day marketing ignores single mother households
business_challenge.social_issue: Lack of recognition for single mothers' dual role

campaign_objectives.primary_objective: Disrupt Father's Day, highlight single mothers

strategy_execution.core_strategy: Celebrate real single mothers and their children

creative_elements.cultural_relevance: Very High - Middle Eastern family structures

channels_media.media_mix: Integrated approach across earned and owned

technology_integration.innovation_level: Low - focus on content and messaging

key_personnel: Tahaab Rais - Regional Head of Strategy, Creative Director
Fouad Abdel Malak, Oliver Robinson - Regional ECD

business_challenge.primary_challenge: COVID muted Diwali, retailers averse to stocking
business_challenge.market_situation: 70% of gifting inventory held by small local shops under pressure

campaign_objectives.primary_objective: Help local stores, encourage shopping there

strategy_execution.core_strategy: Voice AI-activated geo-targeted ads with Shah Rukh Khan
execution_elements: Shah Rukh Khan mentioning specific shop names

campaign_identification.campaign_name: From dreaming big to knowing HOW
campaign_identification.parent_company: Australia and New Zealand Banking Group

business_challenge.primary_challenge: Eroding share of voice, reputational issues, declining consideration
business_challenge.market_situation: Culture and conduct issues affecting NZ big banks

campaign_objectives.primary_objective: Influence customer experience and product innovation

strategy_execution.core_strategy: All-of-business platform: 'If you have a WHY, we have the HOW'

csr_purpose_elements.focus: Business empowerment rather than social cause

business_challenge.primary_challenge: Losing households/share, category declined 10.9%
business_challenge.market_situation: COVID impact on peanut butter category
business_challenge.competitive_context: Need for cultural relevance with youth

campaign_objectives.primary_objective: Improve category share, perception, brand searches

strategy_execution.core_strategy: Partner with Ludacris, music video, TikTok challenge

csr_purpose_elements.focus: Cultural engagement rather than social cause

business_challenge.primary_challenge: Public dubious of food quality
business_challenge.market_situation: Great taste perception but not quality perception

campaign_objectives.primary_objective: Transform perceptions of food quality
secondary_objectives: Win Michelin Star for remote restaurant

strategy_execution.core_strategy: Win Michelin Star for world's most remote KFC
strategy_execution.innovation_factor: Michelin star pursuit for fast food
execution_elements: Target world's most remote KFC (Australian outback)

csr_purpose_elements.focus: Quality perception rather than social cause

market_context.product_context: Launch of Extra Low Carb beer

business_challenge.primary_challenge: Need cheaper low-carb alternative, compromising perception
business_challenge.market_situation: Drinkers felt compromising by drinking low-carb beer

campaign_objectives.primary_objective: Launch Extra Low Carb beer, challenge preconceptions
secondary_objectives: Reframe low-carb as benefit to others

strategy_execution.core_strategy: Valentine's Day launch with love song, 'beer bouquets'

csr_purpose_elements.focus: Relationship benefit rather than social cause

business_challenge.primary_challenge: Refresh 'Just Do It' for new generation
business_challenge.market_situation: Need to prove core belief still inspirational

campaign_objectives.primary_objective: Prove core belief still has power to inspire

strategy_execution.core_strategy: Stories of iconic athletes overcoming barriers

business_impact.campaign_status: Most successful campaign in brand history

campaign_identification.campaign_name: Adlam – An alphabet to preserve a culture

business_challenge.primary_challenge: 90% of world's languages at risk of extinction
business_challenge.market_situation: Fulani people lack alphabet or writing system

campaign_objectives.primary_objective: Preserve Fulani language and culture, expand literacy access

strategy_execution.core_strategy: Launch ADLaM alphabet across 1 billion devices
strategy_execution.innovation_factor: First digital alphabet preservation at scale

awards_recognition.warc_awards: Gold, Middle East & Africa, Cultural Impact, 2024

campaign_identification.campaign_name: Meddle in the New Zealand Election

business_challenge.primary_challenge: Overseas New Zealanders believe votes don't matter
business_challenge.market_situation: Low overseas voter participation

campaign_objectives.primary_objective: Increase overseas voter participation

strategy_execution.core_strategy: Enlist Russian national to encourage 'meddling' in election

reach_metrics.social_reach: 250,000 combined reach on Facebook and Instagram

key_personnel: Jonathan McMahon, Lisa Fedyszyn - Executive Creative Director

market_context.competitive_context: Restaurants using inferior ketchup in Heinz bottles

business_challenge.primary_challenge: Relevance declining, price increases, restaurants using inferior ketchup
business_challenge.market_situation: Inflation and supply chain issues affecting pricing

campaign_objectives.primary_objective: Prove Heinz is the only real ketchup option

strategy_execution.core_strategy: Multiple campaigns: bottle angle, puzzle, petition, fashion stains, Super Bowl hack

csr_purpose_elements.focus: Quality and authenticity rather than social cause

business_challenge.primary_challenge: Lost touch with young, multicultural consumers
business_challenge.market_situation: Brand needed to reassert cultural cachet

campaign_objectives.primary_objective: Bring youth audience back, create growth engine

strategy_execution.core_strategy: Celebrity go-to orders as purchasable meals with content

csr_purpose_elements.focus: Cultural relevance rather than social cause

business_impact.monthly_sales_increase: Average monthly sales to target increased
business_impact.incremental_sales: Hundreds of millions in incremental sales

agency_credits.additional_agencies: Narrative Los Angeles, Alma DDB Miami, Burrell Chicago

business_challenge.primary_challenge: Communicate importance of life insurance
business_challenge.market_situation: Reliance on advisor network for sales

campaign_objectives.primary_objective: Increase consideration, awareness and enquiries

strategy_execution.core_strategy: Use 'hindsight of the dead' via Brokenwood Mysteries partnership
strategy_execution.innovation_factor: TV show partnership for insurance messaging

csr_purpose_elements.focus: Family financial protection rather than social cause

key_personnel: Jonathan McMahon, Lisa Fedyszyn - Executive Creative Director

market_context.social_context: Millions of girls dropping out of school due to periods

business_challenge.primary_challenge: Girls dropping out of school when periods start
business_challenge.market_situation: Category in decline, social taboos around menstruation
business_challenge.educational_gap: Mothers unable to help daughters understand periods

campaign_objectives.primary_objective: Make menstruation part of national curriculum

strategy_execution.core_strategy: Create 'Missing Chapter' content and lobby for curriculum inclusion

business_challenge.primary_challenge: 2021 flooding destroyed largest red wine region in Germany
business_challenge.market_situation: Widespread flooding damage to wineries

campaign_objectives.primary_objective: Increase donations and awareness about flooding damage

strategy_execution.core_strategy: Brand and sell flood-rescued wine bottles

creative_elements.cultural_relevance: Very High - regional German wine culture

market_context.social_context: Body dissatisfaction and appearance discrimination epidemic

business_challenge.primary_challenge: Silent public health epidemic of body dissatisfaction
business_challenge.market_situation: Appearance-based discrimination affecting mental health
business_challenge.social_issue: Women's bodies subject to constant scrutiny and violence

campaign_objectives.primary_objective: Realize appearance discrimination is public health epidemic

strategy_execution.core_strategy: Real Cost of Beauty Ideals study with multi-platform activation

awards_recognition.social_impact: High recognition for public health advocacy

market_context.social_context: Violence against women and girls crisis

business_challenge.primary_challenge: Male violence against women starts with words, progresses to murder
business_challenge.market_situation: One woman dies every three days at hands of a man
business_challenge.behavioral_barrier: Friendship stronger than desire to stop misogyny

campaign_objectives.primary_objective: Increase belief that misogyny is big issue and intervention confidence
secondary_objectives: Provide tools for men to challenge friends

strategy_execution.core_strategy: Interactive film with comedian introducing new word as intervention tool

creative_elements.cultural_relevance: Very High - UK male culture and behavior

business_impact.misogyny_awareness_lift: 21% lift in men seeing misogyny as big issue

business_challenge.primary_challenge: Struggling to secure sufficient government funding for women's football team
business_challenge.market_situation: Matildas (women's team) underfunded compared to men's team
business_challenge.opportunity: 2023 World Cup in Australia as platform

campaign_objectives.primary_objective: Secure additional government funding for women's football
secondary_objectives: Capture public attention during World Cup
Provide rallying cry for women's football support

strategy_execution.core_strategy: Document Matildas' quest for equality during World Cup
strategy_execution.innovation_factor: Using World Cup momentum for funding advocacy

market_context.industry_context: Fast food industry under pressure for clean ingredients

business_challenge.primary_challenge: People demanded clean food, stark contrast to fast food industry
business_challenge.market_situation: Need to announce removal of preservatives
business_challenge.competitive_context: Fast food struggling with health perceptions

campaign_objectives.primary_objective: Announce no longer adding preservatives to show commitment

strategy_execution.core_strategy: Counterintuitive campaign showing burger deterioration
strategy_execution.innovation_factor: Showing product decay as quality proof

agency_credits.creative_agency: INGO Stockholm, DAVID Miami, Publicis Bucharest
key_personnel: Ivan Montebello, Sergio Takhata - Art Director

market_context.agricultural_context: Pressure on farmers to use pesticides and chemicals

business_challenge.primary_challenge: Farmers under pressure to use pesticides, herbicides and fertilizers
business_challenge.market_situation: Organic crops more expensive, fewer buyers willing to pay
business_challenge.supply_chain_issue: Need for organic barley for beer production

campaign_objectives.primary_objective: Encourage more farmers to go organic
secondary_objectives: Create America's first nationally distributed organic beer

strategy_execution.core_strategy: Promise to buy farmers' organic produce as first customer
execution_elements: Commitment to be first organic customer
Michelob ULTRA Pure Gold beer creation

business_challenge.primary_challenge: Popcorn perceived as 'on the go' snack, Cheetos dust seen as barrier
business_challenge.market_situation: Need to drive household penetration with new product

campaign_objectives.primary_objective: Disrupt popcorn category and drive household penetration

strategy_execution.core_strategy: Position Cheetos dust as superpower for avoiding unwelcome tasks

csr_purpose_elements.focus: Fun and mischief rather than social cause

awards_recognition.creative_insight: Recognized for turning negative into positive
